snippet: John Daly withdrew from the British Open because he will have surgery this week on his right elbow, ending his PGA Tour season.
lead_paragraph: John Daly withdrew from the British Open because he will have surgery this week on his right elbow, ending his PGA Tour season.

headline.main: Elbow Surgery Will End Daly’s Season
headline.print_headline: Elbow Surgery Will End Daly’s Season
